channel.description: Week 8 Announcements This Week Mon: Lab 7 Due 11:59 PM Wed: Week 7 Response 11:59 PM Fri: Final Project 11:59 PM TEVALS! Lab 7 Grading No Meeting Required 1: Screenshots 2: Zip File & Readme 3: Monitoring URL 4: GitLab & URL EC: Screenshots Final Project Completion Written Report - Use Template Research, Propose & SWOT Analysis Include Graphics & Data As Needed Live Presentation - 15-30 minutes Convince Me You've Analyzed It Well Small Prototype - Should be Easy Spend 2-4 Hours on Prototype Presentation Live or Pre-recorded Present on or before Friday Schedule Now! Email for Alt. Arrangements Teval Will be sent this week Please respond honestly All comments and feedback welcome! Final Grades Check Canvas Email Me if Concerns Keep in Touch! Discussions on Discord https://discordbot.cs.ksu.edu "Tea Time" Office Hours Tuesday 3:30 | Friday 10:30 One-on-One Office Hours
